728973f-c.text:
Hunton Street, near Holly Street, showing dogwood blossoms on the M.D. Hunton property which is being developed into the Mount Hope Park Development. This is a set of three views taken
the same day.
May 19, 1926
Views 1,2 and 3
P. L. Sperr
728973f-c.folder: Hunton Street & Holly Street, Staten Island, NY

728974f-b.text:
(1)
Hunton Street, at Holly Street, showing part of the land of the Mt. Hope Park Development in Dongan Hills. This is part of
the M.D. Hunton property.
May 19, 1926.
P. L. Sperr
(2)
Dogwood Blossoms near Hunton Street on the M.D. Hunton prope which is being developed into the Mt. Hope Park Development.
May 19, 1926.
P. L. Sperr
(3)
Another view near Hunton and Holly Streets.
May 19, 1926.
P. L. Sperr
